articles.title: 'Age does not define Anahat,' Abhay Singh praises mixed doubles partner - The Bridge
articles.description: Abhay Singh praises 15-year-old Anahat's talent and determination, emphasising that her age does not define his mixed doubles partner.
articles.content: The young Indian sensation Anahat Singh made her mark at the Asian Games 2023, clinching not one but two bronze medals at the tender age of 15. Her partner in mixed doubles, Abhay Singh, couldn't be … [+3223 chars]
